text: Ebrahim Alkazi (18 October 1925 - 4 August 2020Rashtriya Sahara â€“ Band 2, Ausgabe 2, 1991, p. 154Indian Express) was an Indian theatre director and drama teacher. He was the Director of National School of Drama, New Delhi from 1962 to 1977.Meyer, p. 9Banham, p. 18Rubin, p. 158 He directed over 50 plays, including famous productions of: Girish Karnad's Tughlaq, Mohan Rakesh's Ashadh Ka Ek Din, Dharamvir Bharati's Andha Yug and numerous Shakespeare and Greek plays. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Indian educators Category:Indian theatre directors
title: Ebrahim Alkazi
